Fiscalini Ranch Preserve.address: Off Highway 1, South on Windsor , Cambria , CA
reviewComments: Nice boardwalk stroll with great views of the shoreline and rolling hills. Great if you have dogs. It's about a mile each way, and quite lovely at sunset.
